title: Beat the Rush! Aug 8th Huge 1 Bed Near Train/Bus  Lndry+Cat Ok+No Fee!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 32252358', 'Rent: $1,950 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/08/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Welcome to your new home!', 'This one-bedroom, one-bathroom unit is perfect for anyone looking for a convenient and vibrant location.', "You'll be just one block away from the B Line, making it easy to get around the city, and two blocks from Whole Foods, ensuring that you always have access to fresh groceries.", "If you're a music lover, you'll love living so close to Brighton Music Hall; and if you're a student at Boston University, campus is nearby.", 'Plus, with three stops on the T from Packards Corner, getting around town is a breeze.', 'Parking is available on the street with a permit and laundry coin-op in the building.', 'Come see this wonderful apartment today!', 'NO BROKER FEE!!', '1 YEAR LEASE REQUIRED', 'FEATURES', 'Cat Friendly', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Laundry in Building', 'Lots of Light', 'Near Green Line', 'Real Estate Broker', 'John L. Hanrahan', '617-590-0455', 'FOR MORE EXCLUSIVE LISTINGS VISIT: <URL>', 'Anti discrimination Policy-', 'All apartments advertised by Prestige Rental Solutions are available on an equal opportunity basis.', 'All real estate advertised herein is subject to the federal Fair Housing Act and the Massachusetts state law, M.G.L. c.151B, which makes it illegal to advertise any preference, limitation, or discrimination , or discriminate against any person because of race, color, religion, sex, disability ,family status, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, genetic information , ancestry, martial status, national origin or because the person is a member of the  armed forces.']
